title: JBCE discussed CBAM/PFAS grouping restriction - JBCE
author: Super User
text: JBCE updates JBCE discussed CBAM/PFAS grouping restriction 01/10/2021 JBCE invited Ms. Camille Dehestru, Account Director, EPPA in Environment & Energy Committee meeting on 1st October. She gave the presentation about CBAM/EU-ETS latest development, especially possible sectors /products into the Scope of CBAM and general update of PFAS Grouping restriction. We held the committee meeting hybrid basis, and had a fruitful discussion in through Q&A session. JBCE will contribute to 2nd call for evidence of PFAS. For more information please contact: Takuro Koide, Policy Manager (Environment & Energy) This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.
